ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resistance - the reason
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One indication would be: lvl 20 : Force Shock	120 mana lvl 24 : Frost Shock	110 mana Sounds like a clear indication that the Force Shock does something
ygData.messageBody:
According to Keith Wiseman:
> Of course your crazy not to buy it... I haven't seen anyone say that. Most
> people say it gets resisted way too much, and I agree. Just hit 21 and

One indication would be:

lvl 20 : Force Shock 120 mana
lvl 24 : Frost Shock 110 mana

Sounds like a clear indication that the Force Shock does something
additional to just damage, and that *complexifies* the spell.
